page.title: 12FARMS
page.content:
{FARMS IN WINESTEAD}
{FIR TREE FARM} This farm of 250 acres grows mainly crops of wheat, barley and rape. Grass is also grown for grazing the bullocks in summer. At present there are 100 bullocks.
{WILLOW HOUSE FARM} This farm grows mainly cereal crops. There are 100 beasts on the 280 acre farm.
{MANOR FARM} A completely arable farm of 700 acres growing barley, oats, wheat and rape. Rape is a relatively new crop and this goes to Croda Premier in Hull for refining into margarine and cooking oil; the by-product going for animal food.
